Detailed Description

Class for sending/reciving data from/to server.

Implements network client.

bool client::recive (  char *    host,
char *    service,
char *    packet
)  [protected]
 

Sends data (string) to the server, waits for response from this server and then recives it.

Parameters:
host  hostname or IP address of the server
service  port number of the server
packet  a string to send
Returns:
"true" if everything is OK or "false" if there is an error
Bug:
Timeout doesn't seem to work correctly.
